apple pie: A sweet pie filled with spiced apples.
baby back ribs: Tender ribs cooked with barbecue sauce.
baklava: A sweet pastry made with layers of nuts and honey.
beef carpaccio: Thinly sliced raw beef served with olive oil.
beef tartare: Raw minced beef mixed with seasonings.
beet salad: A salad with cooked beets and greens.
beignets: Deep-fried dough topped with powdered sugar.
bibimbap: A Korean rice dish with vegetables and meat.
bread pudding: A dessert made with bread soaked in custard.
breakfast burrito: A tortilla filled with eggs and breakfast ingredients.
bruschetta: Grilled bread topped with tomatoes and basil.
caesar salad: A salad with romaine, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
cannoli: A crispy pastry filled with sweet ricotta cheese.
caprese salad: A salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
carrot cake: A spiced cake made with grated carrots and frosting.
ceviche: Raw fish marinated in citrus and spices.
cheesecake: A creamy dessert with a graham cracker crust.
chicken curry: A dish with chicken cooked in spiced curry sauce.
chicken quesadilla: A grilled tortilla filled with cheese and chicken.
chicken wings: Fried or baked wings with various sauces.
chocolate cake: A rich cake made with chocolate.
chocolate mousse: A light, creamy dessert made with chocolate.
churros: Fried dough sticks rolled in cinnamon sugar.
clam chowder: A creamy soup with clams and potatoes.
club sandwich: A layered sandwich with turkey, bacon, and lettuce.
crab cakes: Fried patties made with crab meat.
creme brulee: A dessert with a caramelized sugar top and custard base.
croque madame: A French sandwich with ham, cheese, and a fried egg.
deviled eggs: Hard-boiled eggs filled with seasoned yolk mixture.
donuts: Fried dough rings, often topped with sugar or glaze.
dumplings: Dough filled with meat or vegetables, steamed or fried.
eggs benedict: Poached eggs on an English muffin with hollandaise sauce.
escargots: Cooked snails served with garlic butter.
falafel: Fried balls made from chickpeas or fava beans.
filet mignon: A tender cut of beef steak.
foie gras: A rich dish made from the liver of a fattened duck or goose.
french onion soup: A soup with caramelized onions and melted cheese.
french toast: Bread soaked in egg and fried, often topped with syrup.
fried rice: Stir-fried rice with vegetables and meat or seafood.
frozen yogurt: A cold dessert made from yogurt.
garlic bread: Bread topped with garlic butter and baked.
gnocchi: Small potato dumplings served with sauce.
greek salad: A salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
grilled cheese sandwich: A sandwich with melted cheese between grilled bread.
grilled salmon: Salmon fillet cooked on a grill.
guacamole: A dip made from mashed avocado and lime.
gyoza: Japanese dumplings filled with meat or vegetables.
hamburger: A grilled beef patty in a bun.
hot and sour soup: A spicy and tangy soup, often with tofu and mushrooms.
hot dog: A cooked sausage served in a bun.
huevos rancheros: Eggs served on tortillas with salsa.
hummus: A creamy dip made from chickpeas and tahini.
ice cream: A frozen dessert made from cream and sugar.
lasagna: Layers of pasta, cheese, and sauce baked together.
lobster bisque: A creamy soup made from lobster.
lobster roll sandwich: A sandwich filled with lobster meat.
macaroni and cheese: Pasta mixed with creamy cheese sauce.
miso soup: A Japanese soup made with fermented soybean paste.
mussels: Steamed or cooked shellfish served with broth or sauce.
nachos: Tortilla chips topped with cheese and other ingredients.
omelette: Eggs cooked and folded around a filling.
pad thai: A Thai stir-fried noodle dish with vegetables and meat.
paella: A Spanish rice dish with seafood and saffron.
pancakes: Flat cakes made from a batter, often served with syrup.
panna cotta: An Italian creamy dessert made with gelatin.
peking duck: A Chinese dish with crispy duck skin and pancakes.
pho: A Vietnamese soup with noodles and meat.
pizza: A baked dish with dough, sauce, cheese, and toppings.
pork chop: A cut of pork meat, often grilled or fried.
poutine: Fries topped with cheese curds and gravy.
prime rib: A tender cut of beef, roasted and served in slices.
pulled pork sandwich: A sandwich with slow-cooked, shredded pork.
ramen: A Japanese noodle soup with meat and vegetables.
ravioli: Pasta filled with meat or cheese, served with sauce.
red velvet cake: A chocolate-flavored cake with red coloring and cream cheese frosting.
risotto: A creamy Italian rice dish cooked in broth.
samosa: A fried pastry filled with spiced potatoes or meat.
scallops: Shellfish with a sweet, tender texture.
seaweed salad: A salad made from marinated seaweed.
shrimp and grits: A Southern dish with shrimp served over creamy corn grits.
spaghetti bolognese: Pasta served with a meat-based tomato sauce.
spaghetti carbonara: Pasta with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
spring rolls: Vegetables or meat wrapped in rice paper and fried.
steak: A thick cut of beef, grilled or fried.
strawberry shortcake: A dessert made with strawberries and whipped cream.
sushi: Vinegared rice with raw fish and other toppings.
tacos: Tortillas filled with meat, cheese, and vegetables.
takoyaki: Japanese octopus balls cooked in batter.
tiramisu: An Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked cake and mascarpone.
tuna tartare: Raw, minced tuna mixed with seasonings.
waffles: A breakfast dish with a grid-like pattern, often served with syrup.
